trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as the base class for the abstract <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: 用作抽象类 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Inline" /> 的基类的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> used to fill the background of the content area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于填充内容区域背景的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill the background of the content area, or <see langword="null" /> to not use a background brush.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充内容区域背景的画笔，或 <see langword="null" />（不使用背景画笔）。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.
trans-unit.target: 显示可用的预定义的画笔颜色样本的表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background%2A> attribute, using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> as the example element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background%2A>属性，使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>作为示例元素。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how the preceding example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了前面的示例中的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 前景为绿色，背景为橘黄色](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "屏幕快照： 前景为绿色，背景为橘黄色")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background%2A>属性以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Background" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> that represents the end of the content in the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示元素中内容末尾的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> that represents the end of the content in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> 中内容末尾的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A> property is often used to append content to the end of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentEnd%2A>属性通常用于将内容追加到末尾<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Forward?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>返回此属性始终具有其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Forward?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> that represents the start of content in the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示元素中内容开头的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext" /> that represents the start of the content in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext" /> 中内容开头的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A> property is often used to insert content to the beginning of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.ContentStart%2A>属性通常用于将内容的开头插入<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Backward?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>返回此属性始终具有其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Backward?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> that represents the position just after the end of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示紧接元素末尾之后位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> that represents the position just after the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示紧接 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> 末尾之后位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Forward?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>返回此属性始终具有其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Forward?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" /> that represents the position just before the start of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示紧邻元素开头之前位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext" /> that represents the position just before the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示紧邻 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointerContext" /> 开头之前位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> returned by this property always has its <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Backward?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>返回此属性始终具有其<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer.LogicalDirection%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection.Backward?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素内容的首选顶级字体系列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 对象，指定首选字体系列，或者指定一个主要首选字体系列并附带一个或多个备用字体系列。

trans-unit.source: The default is the font determined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认字体是由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily" /> 值确定的字体。

trans-unit.source: When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多个系列，第二个和后续的字体系列用作备用系列可以用于中的情况下，主字体系列不可用或不适用。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies a preference only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的首选项。

trans-unit.source: If the specified font family is not available, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> silently falls back to the font determined by the <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字体系列不可用，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>以无提示方式回退到由确定的字体<xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has an attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>，和*值*XAML 值中所述是字符串格式值之一。

trans-unit.source: In code, the attached property usage is supported by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontFamily%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontFamily%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontFamily%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontFamily%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> support an analogous nonattached `FontFamily` property, which the content host uses for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 附加的属性使用情况并不常用，因为大多数元素可以包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>支持一个类似非附加的`FontFamily`属性，内容主机用于呈现。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *fontFamilyName*
trans-unit.target: *fontFamilyName*

trans-unit.source: A string specifying a font family name.
trans-unit.target: 指定字体系列名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, `"Arial"` or `"Century Gothic"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`"Arial"` 或 `"Century Gothic"`。

trans-unit.source: *fontFamilyNamesList*
trans-unit.target: *fontFamilyNamesList*

trans-unit.source: A string specifying multiple font family names, each separated by a comma (any whitespace following a comma is ignored).
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定多个字体系列名称，每个的逗号分隔 （逗号后面的任何空白将被忽略）。

trans-unit.source: The first font family specified serves as the primary font family; subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一个字体系列用作主要字体系列中;后续的字体系列用作备用系列可以用于中的情况下，主字体系列不可用或不适用。

trans-unit.source: For example, `"Arial, Century Gothic"` specifies Arial as the primary font family, with Century Gothic as the fallback font family.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`"Arial, Century Gothic"`指定 Arial 作为主字体系列，并附带世纪歌特作为回退字体系列。

trans-unit.source: *fontFamilyFolderReference*
trans-unit.target: *fontFamilyFolderReference*

trans-unit.source: A string specifying a folder containing the font, along with a font family name.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定包含字体，以及字体系列名称的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The folder and font family name are delimited by a # character.
trans-unit.target: 由 # 字符分隔的文件夹和字体系列名称。

trans-unit.source: The folder reference may be absolute, or relative.
trans-unit.target: 文件夹引用可能是绝对的或相对。

trans-unit.source: For example, `"Custom Fonts\#My Custom Font"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如 `"Custom Fonts\#My Custom Font"`。

trans-unit.source: *fontFamilyUriReference*
trans-unit.target: *fontFamilyUriReference*

trans-unit.source: A string specifying a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the font, along with a font family name.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]字体，以及字体系列名称。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and font family name are delimited by a # character.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]和字体系列名称由 # 字符分隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, `"http://MyFontServer/Fonts/#My Custom Font"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如 `"http://MyFontServer/Fonts/#My Custom Font"`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily%2A> attribute, using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> as the example element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily%2A>属性，使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>作为示例元素。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how the preceding example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了前面的示例中的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Text with text properties set](~/add/media/textelement-fontprops.png "Screenshot: Text with text properties set")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 使用文本属性集文本](~/add/media/textelement-fontprops.png "屏幕快照： 具有文本属性集的文本")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily%2A>属性以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素内容的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.
trans-unit.target: 需要使用到与设备无关的像素的字体大小，大于 0.001 且小于或等于 35791。

trans-unit.source: The default depends on current system settings and depends on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值取决于当前的系统设置，并且依赖于<see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize" />值。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has an attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>, and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>，和*值*XAML 值中所述是字符串格式值之一。

trans-unit.source: In code, the attached property usage is supported by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontSize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontSize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> support an analogous nonattached `FontSize` property, which the content host uses for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 附加的属性使用情况并不常用，因为大多数元素可以包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>支持一个类似非附加的`FontSize`属性，内容主机用于呈现。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0 but smaller than <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>值等于或大于 0.0，但小于<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 未限定的值，以设备无关的像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值如上所述后, 跟一个的以下单元说明符： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （默认值） 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` is inches; 1in==96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize%2A> attribute, using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> as the example element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize%2A>属性，使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>作为示例元素。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how the preceding example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了前面的示例中的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Text with text properties set](~/add/media/textelement-fontprops.png "Screenshot: Text with text properties set")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 使用文本属性集文本](~/add/media/textelement-fontprops.png "屏幕快照： 具有文本属性集的文本")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize%2A>属性以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize" /> is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize" /> 设置为大于 35791 或小于等于 0.001 的值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontSize" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font-stretching characteristics for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素内容的字体拉伸特征。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> structure that specifies the desired font-stretching characteristics to use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> 结构，指定希望使用的字体拉伸特征。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has an attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>, and *value* is one of the string-format property names of the <xref:System.Windows.FontStretch> class.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>，和*值*是字符串格式之一的属性名称<xref:System.Windows.FontStretch>类。

trans-unit.source: In code, the attached property usage is supported by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontStretch%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontStretch%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontStretch%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontStretch%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> support an analogous nonattached `FontStretch` property, which the content host uses for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 附加的属性使用情况并不常用，因为大多数元素可以包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>支持一个类似非附加的`FontStretch`属性，内容主机用于呈现。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStretch" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font style for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素内容的字体样式。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyles" /> class that specifies the desired font style.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyles" /> 类的一个成员，指定所需的字形。

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle" /> 值确定。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has an attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>, and *value* is one of the string-format property names in the <xref:System.Windows.FontStyles> class.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>，和*值*是字符串格式之一中的属性名称<xref:System.Windows.FontStyles>类。

trans-unit.source: In code, the attached property usage is supported by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontStyle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontStyle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> support an analogous nonattached `FontStyle` property, which the content host uses for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 附加的属性使用情况并不常用，因为大多数元素可以包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>支持一个类似非附加的`FontStyle`属性，内容主机用于呈现。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top-level font weight for the content of the element.

trans-unit.target: 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetFontWeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetFontWeight%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> to apply to the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于元素内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: The brush used to apply to the text contents.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于文本内容的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Black" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Black" />。

trans-unit.source: For a table of swatches that shows the available predefined brush colors, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>.
trans-unit.target: 显示可用的预定义的画笔颜色样本表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has an attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>, and *value* is a string that resolves to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> implementation value.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Foreground%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>，和*值*是一个字符串，将解析为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>实现值。

trans-unit.source: In code, the attached property usage is supported by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetForeground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetForeground%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，附加的属性使用情况受<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.GetForeground%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.SetForeground%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The attached property usage is not common, because most elements that can be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> support an analogous nonattached `Foreground` property, which the content host uses for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 附加的属性使用情况并不常用，因为大多数元素可以包含在<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>支持一个类似非附加的`Foreground`属性，内容主机用于呈现。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical children of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可用于迭代该元素的逻辑子元素的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for the logical children.
trans-unit.target: 用于逻辑子级的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Arguments associated with the property value change.
trans-unit.target: 与属性值更改关联的参数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.Property" /> property specifies which property has changed, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue" /> property specifies the previous property value, and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue" /> property specifies the new property value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.Property" /> 属性指定已更改的属性，<see cref="P:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue" /> 属性指定之前的属性值，<see cref="P:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.NewValue" /> 属性指定新的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Handles notifications that one or more of the dependency properties that exist on the element have had their effective values changed.
trans-unit.target: 处理元素上存在的一个或多个依赖项属性的有效值已更改的通知。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to set the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要设置其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily" /> 属性值的依赖项对象。

trans-unit.source: The new value to set the property to.
trans-unit.target: 要将此属性设为的新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily" /> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定依赖对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily" /> 附加属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 要将此属性设为的新值。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 添加子对象。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于元素内容的文本效果集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" /> containing one or more <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection" />，其中包含一个或多个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> 对象，这些对象定义了要应用于此元素内容的效果。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" /> (not an empty collection).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />（不是空集合）。

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is set to `null` and has no <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性设置为`null`，并且没有<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>与之关联。

trans-unit.source: Before adding any text effects, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection> and assign it to this property.
trans-unit.target: 在添加任何文本效果之前, 创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection>并将其分配给此属性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a simple text effect and apply it to a text <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个简单的文本效果并将其应用于文本<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run>通过<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.TextEffects" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取该元素内容的当前有效的版式变体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Typography" /> object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Typography" /> 对象，它指定当前有效的版式变体。

trans-unit.source: For a list of default typography values, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Typography" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关默认版式值的列表，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Typography" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A> property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument.Typography%2A>属性是仅适用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体。

trans-unit.source: A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant.
trans-unit.target: 版式变体不起上不支持该变体的字体。

trans-unit.source: For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 本主题的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的版式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Typography%2A> attribute, using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> as the example element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Typography%2A>属性，使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>作为示例元素。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how the preceding example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了前面的示例中的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "屏幕快照： 改变版式的文本")

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the following figure shows how a similar example with default typographic properties renders.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，下图显示了一个具有默认版式属性的类似示例的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "屏幕快照： 改变版式的文本")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Typography%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.Typography%2A>属性以编程方式。
